text: Ian Harshman (September 13, 1974 - August 20, 2021), better known by his stage name Ian Carey, was an American house DJ, musician, and record producer. He was raised in Hancock, Maryland and spent most of his career in Miami, Florida.One-man-band video producer has high hopes after MTV award Frederick News-Post His career began in 1993. He became a record producer in 1998. He worked with Jason Papillon (see DJ Jason Brooks) as part of Soul Providers. Their first single, "Rise", peaked within the top 60 of the charts in the United Kingdom. Carey died on August 20, 2021 at the age of 46.House icon Ian Carey dies at the age of 46 ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American DJs Category:American record producers Category:Musicians from Baltimore Category:Musicians from Miami
title: Ian Carey
